name: Homeward Bound (MattiDev)
description:
Homeward Bound is a co-op puzzle platformer where two players are bound together with a rope. Use the rope in various ways to interact with each other and objects in the environment to complete the challenges ahead! 

The key mechanic of the game centers around the rope and how the two players will solve the puzzles with it. 

Homeward Bound is the result of a two month long project, made by game design students. The goal was to develop a game for one of the team member's nephew as a gift. We put our heads together and managed to create this game!

The game is developed for controllers on pc, but you can press K to enable keyboard controls as well. 

Developed by:

Joakim Malmström - Programmer / Product Owner
Krzesimir Pszenny - Project Manager
Matti Johansson - Game Designer / Sound
Lilja Bräckman - Graphical Artist
